item.title: 关于 hugo, easy-hugo, ox-hugo, spacemacs 集成相关的问题
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: ox-hugo，easy-hugo, spacemacs的集成 ox-hugo 写文档 这里，在写文档的时候，配置好就可以了,无需修改 spacemacs的配置。

item.title: 使用org-mode和ox-hugo写文档
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: Env os: mac Emacs: 26.1 Spacemacs: 0.300.0 Org: 9.1.2 Hugo: v0.41 ox-hugo: 20181106.2350 prodigy: 20180511.938 Step Part 1: Blog Setup Download Hugo 1 pacman -S hugo Initialize Project 1 2 3 hugo new site test-blog cd test-blog git init Download a Theme (YMMV) This seems like a clean, simple theme. You can use a submodule like this: 1 git submodule add https://github.com/goodroot/hugo-classic.git themes/hugo-classic Or you can just clone it 1
